    %% name = RDoc::Markdown::Literals

    %% header { # coding: UTF-8 # frozen_string_literal: true # :markup: markdown

    ## – # This set of literals is for Ruby 1.9 regular expressions and gives full # unicode support. # # Unlike peg-markdown, this set of literals recognizes Unicode alphanumeric # characters, newlines and spaces. }

    Alphanumeric = /p{Word}/ AlphanumericAscii = /[A-Za-z0-9]/ BOM = “uFEFF” Newline = /n|rn?|p{Zl}|p{Zp}/ NonAlphanumeric = /p{^Word}/ Spacechar = /t|p{Zs}/

    Validate

    Generated by RDoc 6.1.0.

    Based on Darkfish by Michael Granger.
